  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3337</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Notes - A star is born</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anmerkungen - ein Stern wird getragen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notes - un tenir le premier rôle est soutenu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notas - uma estrela é carregada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Note - una stella è sopportata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημειώσεις - ένα αστέρι γεννιέται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Notas - se lleva una estrella</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article,which appears in the ETNI magazine RAG, suggests the use ofa variation of the popular program "A Star is born" as a motivating force in English class, and explains how it might be done.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">songs</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel, der im ETNI Zeitschrift LAPPEN 
erscheint, schlägt vor, daß die Gebrauch ofa Variante des populären
Programms "ein Stern" als Motivierenkraft in der englischen Kategorie 
getragen wird und beschreibt, wie er erfolgt werden konnte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet article, qui paraît dans le CHIFFON de 
magazine d'ETNI, suggère que la variation d'ofa d'utilisation du 
programme de grande diffusion "un Tenir le premier rôle soit soutenue" comme 
force de motivation dans la classe anglaise, et explique comment il 
pourrait être fait.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo, que se publica no PANO do 
compartimento de ETNI, sugere que a variação do ofa do uso do 
programa popular "uma estrela está carregada" como uma força 
motivating na classe inglesa, e explica como pôde ser feito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo, che è publicato nel PANNO dello 
scomparto di ETNI, suggerisce che la variazione di ofa di uso del 
programma popolare "una stella è sopportata" come forza di 
motivazione nel codice categoria inglese e che spiega come potrebbe 
essere fatto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο, που εμφανίζεται στο ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ περιοδικών
ETNI, προτείνει την παραλλαγή ofa χρήσης του δημοφιλούς 
προγράμματος "που ένα αστέρι γεννιέται" ως παρακινώντας δύναμη 
στην αγγλική κλάση, και εξηγεί πώς να γίνει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este artículo, que aparece en el TRAPO del 
compartimiento de ETNI, sugiere que la variación del ofa del uso del 
programa popular "una estrella esté llevada" como fuerza de la 
motivación en clase inglesa, y explica cómo puede ser que sea hecho.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Strategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Liede</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'enseignement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chansons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias ensinando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">canções</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie d'istruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">canzoni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρατηγικές διδασκαλίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τραγούδια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrategias de enseñanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">canciones</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
